name: Until You
description:
Contact Email:

zsstudiosinfo@gmail.com 

Summary:

Wish upon a star and fold me a thousand paper cranes, hold my hand and walk on the trajectory of eternity by my side, for I ask only one thing of you, your forever…

 

 You run an ordinary antique shop in a small city of Japan, living your life like a normal person would that is until you save a stranger from freezing to death in a cold winter night…

 Characters 

Protagonist:

You are the protagonist who runs an ordinary antique shop…

 

Takeuchi Ichigo:

Your childhood best friend, who is more than a friend for you, but does he think the same? A hot headed businessman who is overprotective of you…

 

Hasegawa Kaname:

A stranger you save on a cold winter night, shrouded in mystery, he takes you places no has ever bothered with…

 

Shizuo:

A mystery and a force to be reckoned with…

 

Ishida:

A stoic subordinate of someone you are likely to meet…

 

Takahashi Akira:

He runs a tattoo parlor and tends to ruffle your feathers whenever you meet each other…

 

Umiko:

A woman whom you meet by the quirk of fate, yet she becomes and integral part of your life…
